scripts.watch: npm run build && npm-run-all -p serve watch:html watch:js watch:css watch:images
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run copy:vendorjs && npm run copy:vendorfonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.copy:vendorjs: mkdir dist/js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js dist/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.js dist/js
scripts.copy:vendorfonts: cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts dist/ && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/fonts dist/
